title: The Promise
description: Some of the stories will leave you breathless; they will call unwept tears on your face, shake you hard and swap you off your feet. Others will show you who you really are, what you are made of. The Promise will make you think and will bring a smile on your face.The feelings come from the heart. The dreams come from the heart. The love comes from the heart. Open yours for The Promise and let it give you freedom. "THE PROMISE" is compilation of ten short stories. And this is the first small eBook of more to follow. The cover photo is made by a very close friend of mine. She is a very talented young photographer.Find me on Paths of the spirit series by J.V.K.
author: J.V.K.
